name: upwork-challenge-v2
description: Voice chat application with NestJS backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: cd backend && rmdir /s /q node_modules dist 2>nul & cd ../frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules .next 2>nul
